title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4409.4 - Disposition of revenues
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4409.4 - Disposition of revenues

State Regulations

All revenues derived from the surcharge plus the breaks
shall be held separate and apart from any monies otherwise authorized to be
retained from pari-mutuel pools and shall be separately distributed from monies
for any other purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4409.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
